allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix tool filtering to prevent mixing tool types

- Separate Vertex AI built-in tools (CodeExecution, GoogleSearch, etc.) from function declarations
- Each tool type gets its own genai.Tool instance to avoid proto validation errors
- Prevents "tools[0].tool_type: one_of 'tool_type' has more than one initialized field" error

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix MCP tool addition to prevent tool type mixing

- Ensure MCP tools are added to dedicated function declaration tools
- Prevent mixing FunctionDeclarations with Vertex AI built-in tools (CodeExecution, GoogleSearch, etc.)
- Find existing function declaration tool or create new one when adding MCP tools
- Fixes "tools[0].tool_type: one_of 'tool_type' has more than one initialized field" error
- Updated all MCP addition functions: tools, prompts, resources, and resource templates

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Improve unsupported part type error message with detailed information

- Replace generic "unsupported part type: %T" with detailed breakdown
- Add specific information for InlineData, FileData, VideoMetadata, CodeExecutionResult, ExecutableCode
- Include comprehensive logging with part details for debugging
- Show MIME types, data sizes, and other relevant metadata when available
- Helps developers understand exactly what part type was received and why it''s unsupported

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add support for ExecutableCode and CodeExecutionResult parts in streaming

- Handle ExecutableCode parts by wrapping code in markdown code blocks  
- Handle CodeExecutionResult parts by displaying the execution output
- Convert if-else chain to switch statement for better readability
- Maintain existing error handling for truly unsupported part types
- Enables proper display of code execution results from Vertex AI tools

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
